Data Fields

 EDMA Channel configuration which is populated to setup the transfer.

 EDMA Translated Address for the SCI TD register.
 

Detailed Description

SCI Driver EDMA Block.

The structure is used to hold all the pertinent information with respect to the UART DMA.

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
